parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear brake light switch can cause the loss of rear brake function, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when braking on the highway.
symptoms: The brake pedal goes to the full down position with no effect on braking
fluid leaks from the switch area
the wiring connector is charred from heat.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS module can cause the loss of front brake function, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when braking on busy roads.
symptoms: The front brakes fail to respond without warning
the brake pedal is hard to pull
the ABS module closes and the front brakes cannot be applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause the loss of brake function, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when braking on busy roads.
symptoms: The brake pedal is depressed
but the vehicle fails to respond
the vehicle sideswipes another vehicle or crashes into an obstacle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the throttle body sensor can cause the vehicle to stall and lose power without warning, which can lead to accidents or leave the rider stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls and loses power without warning
the vehicle hesitates or stumbles while riding
the throttle response is delayed or erratic.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Faulty spark plugs can cause the vehicle to stall and lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the rider stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls and loses power
the engine misfires
the vehicle hesitates or stumbles while riding.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden seizure of the rear brakes can cause loss of control, accidents, or injuries, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: The rear brakes seize without warning
the motorcycle experiences sudden and unexpected braking
the rear wheel locks up
the motorcycle becomes unstable or difficult to control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Electronic Stability Control (ESC) system can increase the risk of accidents, especially at high speeds, as it can cause the motorcycle to lose traction or stability.
symptoms: The motorcycle experiences loss of traction
instability
or difficulty controlling the vehicle
especially during cornering or sudden maneuvers.
